title: A Guide to Hinduism by Maya Warrier (2006) [5 Formats]
description:
Title: A Guide to Hinduism (Faith Guides for Higher Education)
Author: Maya Warrier
Category: Academic
Series: Faith Guides for Higher Education
Publisher: Philosophical & Religious Studies Subject Centre, Learning & Teaching Support Network (PRS-LTSN) (September 2006)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0954452488
ISBN-13: 978-0954452483

This short, 28-page guide is highly succinct, clear and informative about the basics of the Hindu religion, in a direct and easy-to-understand manner that anyone can appreciate and benefit from. The general history, background, beliefs, practices and modern context are covered. Highly recommended for anyone with a passing interest in the religion or those looking to brush up on some knowledge regarding it.

This torrent contains the original production PDF, as well as highly readable copies of EPUB, MOBI, LIT, and AZW3 versions converted in Calibre. The front cover and generated metadata.opf file are also included. Please seed, and enjoy!
